mapper.sql: username, pwd, realname, gender, uuid, referrer, tel, create_time
mapper.select: SELECT u.*, u.create_time regTime, r.uid 'referrer.uid', r.username 'referrer.username', r.realname 'referrer.realname' FROM d_user_msg u,d_user_msg r WHERE u.referrer = r.uid AND u.is_valid IS TRUE;
SELECT uid, FROM d_user_msg u, r_user_role_rela r WHERE u.uid = r.uid AND r.rid = 2 AND is_valid IS TRUE;
SELECT s.rid, s.role_name roleName, s.description desc FROM s_role_code s, d_user_msg u, r_user_role_rela r WHERE u.referrer = r.uid AND r.rid = s.rid AND u.uid = #{uid};
